articles.author: Chris Isidore, CNN Business
articles.title: Spirit and Frontier Airlines plan to merge - CNN
articles.description: Spirit and Frontier Airlines on Monday announced a $6.6 billion merger, a combination of low-fare carriers that would create America's fifth-largest airline.

articles.description: The Blues have the chance to become world champions in Abu Dhabi this week but the tournament that matters greatly in South America has been treated with indifference by English clubs in the past

articles.title: Researchers race to study probiotic before white nose syndrome spreads to B.C. bats - CBC.ca
articles.description: Researchers say a deadly fungus that has nearly wiped out a North American bat species hasn't yet spread to British Columbia, giving them valuable time to study whether probiotics prevent the disease.
